original: 家族號稱四世三公，後擔任虎賁中郎將，為西園八校尉之一，又受舉薦為中軍校尉，成為西園軍的副統領。
text: The family was known as the fourth generation and the third gong, and later served as the Hubenzhong Lang general, one of the eight lieutenants of the Xiyuan, and was recommended as the lieutenant of the Chinese Army and became the deputy commander of the Xiyuan Army.
